scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install" "cd proxy && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start" "cd proxy && npm start"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm run build && cd .. && copyfiles -f client/dist/* server/dist/web && copyfiles -f server/web/images/* server/dist/web/images
